name: WW - Keep Warm
description:
Rejected by humanity, two werewolves must find a way to survive in the cold wilderness. However the shackles of their past are not so easily broken.

It hunts them still...

======================

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

C : Change forms.

Click: Build and 

Click: Attack(Werewolf only)
